Segment.name: PAD
Segment.comment: To specify the product transfer type, and/or line item number

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: ProductTransferTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of product transfer

Field.name: ChangeOrResponseTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of change to the line item

Field.name: PriceMultiplierQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of price multiplier

Field.name: Multiplier
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

SyntaxNote.name: R0102
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of PAD01 or PAD02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PAD04 or PAD05 is present, then the other is required.
